name: jest-environment-selenium-webdriver

scripts.test:chrome: npm run docker:chrome && npm run jest:chrome && docker stop jsc && docker rm jsc
scripts.test:edge: npm run docker:edge && npm run jest:edge && docker stop jse && docker rm jse
scripts.test:firefox: npm run docker:firefox && npm run jest:firefox && docker stop jsf && docker rm jsf
scripts.test: npm run test:chrome && npm run test:edge && npm run test:firefox

description: Jest environment for using Selenium webdriver during tests.
